articles.caption: A look at WB's Multiversus' beta.  1 Day old and 140k+ players on Steam.  The power of Cross IP baby
articles.title: Multiversus' open beta is a day old, already has a high player count
articles.description: Warner Bros.' MultiVersus just released its open beta, and the game is already rising to player charts on both PC and console.

articles.caption: A look at another banger from Eric on surviving the marketing winter
articles.title: Surviving the mobile marketing winter: customer unit economics | Mobile Dev Memo by Eric Seufert
articles.description: Surviving the mobile marketing winter: customer unit economics. Mobile marketing and advertising, freemium monetization strategy, and marketing science.

articles.caption: A look at Raid: Shadow Legens hitting $1B in spend and 62M Download. That's $16 per install since 2018.  WILD
articles.title: Raid: Shadow Legends hits $1bn in lifetime player spend from 62m downloads - Mobilegamer.biz
articles.description: Sensor Tower says Plarium‚Äôs RPG is now in an exclusive club that includes Honor of Kings, Candy Crush Saga, PUBG Mobile and Clash and Clans.

articles.caption: A look at Apex Legends Mobile earns $20M and 26M Download since March this year.
articles.title: Apex Legends Mobile earns EA over $20m, passes 26m downloads - Mobilegamer.biz
articles.description: Major milestone hit a little over two months after launch, with Japan proving to be a wildly lucrative market.

articles.caption: A look at Meta's acquisition of Within blocked by FTC
articles.title: The FTC files injunction to stop Meta from buying VR developer Within
articles.description: Last October, Meta attempted to acquire Within, the VR workout app developer. Now that acquisition has been stopped by the FTC's filing of an injunction.

articles.caption: A look at Meta's Reality Labs losing $2.8 billlllyyy
articles.title: Despite uptick in revenue, Meta's Reality Labs posts $2.8 billion loss
articles.description: Revenue for the VR and metaverse-minded Reality Labs division rose by around $150 million from where it was a year ago, but Meta's heavy investments in its dream of a virtual future pull the division's income into the red.

articles.caption: A look at Naavik's Two Divergent Approaches to Blockchain Gaming
articles.title: Two Divergent Approaches to Blockchain Gaming ‚Äî Naavik
articles.description:
Minecraft and Square Enix have two widely different approaches and stances 
on NFTs / web3 gaming. Obviously, support for blockchain in gaming exists 
on a spectrum but what does this mean for the industry writ large? We also 
tease our latest game deconstruction of Apex Mobile.

articles.caption: A look at Steam tags and why they work
articles.title: The evolution of Steam tags (& why we dig 'em!)
articles.description: While suggestions solely based on media you‚Äôve consumed also work well, I do think discovery via tags can be super valuable, especially on a platform that approaches 100,000 games.

articles.caption: A look at Open World, a studio founded by Loaded (a gaming talent management agency)
articles.title: New studio Open World announced by Loaded | VentureBeat
articles.description: Talent management and marketing firm Loaded announced today that it is opening a new studio named Open World.

articles.caption: A look at Magicave's $6.4M raise
articles.title: Digital hobby startup Magicave receives new round of funding | VentureBeat
articles.description: Digital toy, game, and hobby startup Magicave has raised $6.4 million. A majority of the funds come in the form of a successful seed round.

articles.caption: A look at Magic Eden + Genopets' first gaming semi-fungible token marketplace
articles.title: Magic Eden introduces semi-fungible tokens (SFTs) marketplace with Genopets | VentureBeat
articles.description: Magic Eden has introduced its "semi-fungible token" (SFT) marketplace with the blockchain game Genopets.
